title: Slow cooker cider pulled pork
ingredients: ['3 (330ml) bottles of cider', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1kg pork fillet', '120g butter', '1 large onion, cut into strips', '100g brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon onion granules', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and sliced', '6 rolls or baps, split']
